name: Kaine 'Razor' Rourke
description: Rourke is a hulking figure with cybernetic enhancements protruding from his skull and arms. His eyes glow with an unsettling red light, betraying the volatile nature of his mutation. A visible tremor runs through him as he speaks.

traits: loyal to the corporation (despite rogue status)
personality.voice: Deep, raspy and distorted through cybernetics; sounds like a malfunctioning speaker.
personality.agenda: Retrieve stolen data at any cost. Kill anyone who stands in his way.
personality.background: Rourke was once an elite corporate enforcer before a failed experiment left him unstable and volatile. The corporation disavowed him but secretly implanted a tracking device, ensuring he can be controlled if necessary.

flavor.rationale: Rourke is a rogue corporate agent hunting down a rival who has stolen sensitive data. He's willing to kill anyone in his path and doesn't care about collateral damage.
